about_the_game:
A dark force is corrupting the land. Elemental creatures are losing control. You must master the art of battle, forge the most powerful weapons, and recruit legendary allies to halt Ogre Muk’s reign of terror. Will you rise as a hero, or let it fall into darkness?

Chronicles of Veldoria is a tactical RPG that redefines classic turn-based combat with its unique Press Turn battle system. Learn to exploit enemy weaknesses, merge with elemental spirits, and upgrade powerful skills to dominate the battle field. Every attack matters.

                       Two childhood friends. A world in chaos. A tyrant rising.

Choose between Alex, the charismatic warrior, or Elizabeth, the kind-hearted mage, and embark on a quest across six vast regions, each of which is guarded by corrupted elemental bosses under the influence of the dark tyrant, Ogre Muk.

Once you’ve made your choice, you’ll battle these legendary creatures and uncover ancient secrets to strike a powerful blow against Muk’s sinister plans. You won’t be alone, however. You’ll encounter brave heroes that will join your cause against tyranny, as well as many citizens throughout the world looking to lend a hand.

                                                              Key Features

                          Press Turn Battle System – Master Tactical Combat

Press Turn is a deep, strategic battle system where every action carries weight. Prepare for intense, tactical encounters where skillful play is rewarded, and mistakes can be punishing:

  • Exploit enemy weaknesses or land critical hits to earn extra turns and turn the tables

  • Missing an attack doesn’t just waste your move—it costs your team an additional turn!

  • Use your skills wisely, as each ability consumes only a single turn, demanding careful planning in every battle.

         Convince Enemies to Join You & Merge with Weapons, Armor, or Allies

Pure weapons provide a modest stat boost, but diving into side quests will allow you to recruit unique monsters to your party. Once allied, these creatures can merge with weapons, armor, or even your teammates, granting substantial stat boosts, unique traits, and powerful new skills.

Additional Features

✅ No Random Encounters – See enemies on the world map and strategize your fights.

✅ Animated Enemies – Every battle comes alive with smooth enemy animations.

✅ Job Point System – Upgrade your skills and build an epic squad of characters.

✅ Deep side quests – Earn extra rewards and meeting interesting characters

✅ Gamepad Support – Full controller compatibility for all platforms.

Thank you again for your support. Please help spread the word of my game and feel free to reach out to me with any feedback on your experience, including bug fixes and ideas for what you’d like to see implemented in future levels.

Wishlist Chronicles of Veldoria today to be the first to play this epic RPG! Join our journey and shape the game’s future in Early Access!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: Next Level Gaming cordially invites you to embark on an epic tale of friendship, honor, and heroism set in the majestic lands of Veldoria. You’ll meet new allies, discover hidden items, and gather strength to battle the malignant forces of an ancient evil, Ogre Muk!
